com.complet

Class LinkRetrieve

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback
      • com.complet.LinkRetrieve

  • public class LinkRetrieve
extends javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback

    Link Retrieve - LinkRetrieve.java

    The LinkRetrieve Class is a class that establishes an HTTP connection with a link and then it Extracts all links within an "a" html tag having an HREF attribute.

    Note: * It also EXCLUDES :
    css
    jpg
    js
    gif
    png
    mp3
    mp4
    zip
    gz
    jpeg
    pdf
    Download links ( "://dl." )

    Since:
    2017-01-02
    Version:
    6.0
    Author:
    Complet

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public static void start(java.lang.String link)

        start is the first method of this class. Gets an String as parameter. it established an HTTP connection with the link.

        Parameters:
        link - which is the link to be checked
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - which occurs when a link is malformed.

      • handleStartTag

        public void handleStartTag(javax.swing.text.html.HTML.Tag t,
                           javax.swing.text.MutableAttributeSet a,
                           int pos)

        handleStartTag is called by the start method. When an "a" tag is met , it checks if the attribute is HREF. If it is it extracts the link. Depending on the format of the link ( if it contains a protocol or not, if it is a path of the base url etc.) and from which thread's base url was this link extracted. It is then cross-checked if the link is valid or not by getting the http response from the server it is hosted and if it contains a meta robot tag. Finally it is added in the thread's list.

        Overrides:
        handleStartTag in class javax.swing.text.html.HTMLEditorKit.ParserCallback
        Parameters:
        t - an HTML.Tag.
        a - MutableAttributeSet
        int - position
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - which occurs when an html link does NOT contain at least a link with an HREF attribute, hence the enumeration remains empty.
        java.io.IOException - Input/Output Exception.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - which occurs when any one of the threads is interrupted.
